title: The Grateful Dead Live at Nassau Coliseum on 1991-03-29
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi CR-5A > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab > R8Brain > TLH > FLAC 1644. Transfer by Andrew F. July 2011.
source: AUD: 2x Nakamichi CM300/CP4 shotguns > Casio DA-7 (lead deck) > Sony TC-D5M (first deck out) > Maxell MXS 90/100. Mics on 7-foot stand, front row OTS. Taped by Ted Gidley.
